title: Using Limit Orders
summary: Master permissionless limit orders to buy or sell at your exact price target.
content:
Non-Custodial Limit Orders

Intent Protocol introduces a safer way to trade: Non-Custodial Limit Orders.

How it differs from CEXs

On a Centralized Exchange (CEX), you deposit funds into their wallet. If they go down, your funds are lost.
On Intent Protocol, your funds stay in your wallet (or your personal escrow account) until the order is actually filled.

Creating an Order

  1. Navigate to the Limit tab on the Pro interface.
  2. Enter your Sell amount and your desired Buy amount. This determines your limit price.
  3. Set an expiration time (e.g., 24 hours).
  4. Sign the intent.

Your order is now broadcast to the Relayer network. It sits in the Order Book until the market price matches your target. Once matched, it executes automatically.
